explains: n. 技术性细节；诉讼程序性细节；专门性；术语的使用

sentences.en: The earlier verdict was overturned on a legal technicality.
sentences.cn: 较早的裁决因法律上的一项技术性细则而遭到推翻。

sentences.en: The appeal Court rejected the appeal on a technicality.
sentences.cn: 上诉法院驳回了就技术细节问题的上诉。

sentences.en: And all day long all I could think about is how I used a technicality in the law to help a murderer walk away a free man.
sentences.cn: 我一整天都想我是如何使用法律这个利器，让一个杀人犯重获自由。
